name: get_time
description: Get current date and time in various formats and timezones

function.name: get_time
function.description: Get the current date and time with flexible formatting options and timezone support. Returns comprehensive time information including ISO strings, formatted dates, Unix timestamps, and timezone details. Supports multiple output formats for different use cases such as logging, user display, or API integration.

format.description: Output format for the timestamp. Options: 'iso' for ISO 8601 format (default), 'unix' for Unix timestamp, 'readable' for human-readable format, 'custom' for custom formatting

timezone.description: Timezone for the output. Use standard timezone names like 'UTC', 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London', etc. Default is system timezone

custom_format.description: Custom date format string when format is 'custom'. Uses standard date formatting tokens like YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

response_format.description: Returns JSON object with 'success' (boolean), 'timestamp' (ISO string), 'tool_name' (string), 'current_time' (in requested format), 'timezone', 'iso_string', 'unix_timestamp', and 'readable_format'. Error responses include 'error' field with detailed message.
